statement: This privacy policy statement sets out how Zaya uses and protects any information collected when you use this website. Zaya is obligated to use this information only in accordance with the Privacy Policy Statement
collect: We may collect the following information
name: name
Demographic: Demographic information such as zip code, preferred merchandise and your interests
relevant: Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers
understand: We need this information to understand your needs and provide a better service, and in particular for the following reasons
We may use: We may use this information to improve our products and services.
periodically: We may periodically send promotional emails about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using your email address.
time to time: From time to time, we may use your information to contact you for marketing research purposes. You will be contacted by email, phone, or mail. We may use this information to modify the site according to your interests.
committed: We are committed to ensuring that your private information is protected from access or disclosure by any unauthorized party. We have put in place all necessary procedures on the ground and electronically to protect and secure the information collected on our website.
Our website: Our website may contain links to other websites. We want to draw your attention that we are not responsible for protecting the privacy of your information that you may provide while visiting those sites, and these sites are not subject to this privacy statement.
Sharing: Sharing your information with other parties
distribute: We do not sell, distribute, or rent your personal information to third parties unless we obtain your consent or are required by law to do so. We use your personal information to send you information about offers and updates in our store.
